items.text: {"name": "MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services", "description": "The Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB) seeks a full-service agency to serve as agency of record, providing creative and media buying services to develop the Monterey County brand and promote tourism. The agency will collaborate with the MCCVB Marketing Communications team to plan, develop, and execute integrated marketing programs across Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. The scope includes strategy, creative development, media planning and buying, content planning, reporting and analytics, research, and account support. The primary goals are to drive overnight visitation and reinforce Monterey County as a premier tourism destination. The initial contract term is July 26, 2021 to June 30, 2022, with possible extensions.", "customer": "Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB)", "estimated_start_date": "2021-07-26", "estimated_finish_date": "2022-06-30", "estimated_total_cost": 240000.0, "project_type": "IDG - Agency Services", "client_name": "Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB)", "client_address": "787 Munras Avenue, Suite 110, Monterey, CA 93940, USA", "client_email": "marketing@seemonterey.com"}

task_list.task_description: Conduct a project kickoff meeting with MCCVB stakeholders to align on objectives, deliverables, timelines, and communication protocols. Document and distribute meeting minutes.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Initial alignment is required to ensure all parties are on the same page before project execution.

task_list.task_description: Conduct research to understand the current Monterey County brand perception, target audiences, competitive landscape, and tourism trends. Gather insights from stakeholders and existing data sources.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Research is foundational for strategy and creative development.

task_list.task_description: Establish account management processes, assign team roles, set up communication channels, and define reporting cadence with MCCVB.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Account management setup is required for ongoing project coordination.

task_list.task_description: Develop an integrated marketing strategy based on research findings, including objectives, key messages, channel mix (Paid, Earned, Owned), and KPIs.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Strategy must be defined before creative and media planning.

task_list.task_description: Provide ongoing account support, manage project documentation, schedule regular status meetings, and coordinate between MCCVB and agency teams.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Continuous support is required throughout the project lifecycle.

task_list.task_description: Develop creative concepts and campaign ideas aligned with the marketing strategy. Present concepts to MCCVB for feedback and approval.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Creative concepts are needed before asset production.

task_list.task_description: Develop a detailed media plan, including channel selection, audience targeting, flighting, and budget allocation across Paid, Earned, and Owned media.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media plan is required before media buying and campaign execution.

task_list.task_description: Produce creative assets (copy, design, video, digital, print) for the initial campaign launch. Ensure assets meet MCCVB brand guidelines and channel specifications.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Assets are required for campaign launch; split into phases for manageability.

task_list.task_description: Negotiate, purchase, and place media buys according to the approved media plan for the initial campaign period. Coordinate with media vendors and MCCVB.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media buying is required for campaign execution; split into phases for manageability.

task_list.task_description: Launch the initial campaign across selected Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. Monitor for issues and ensure all assets are live as planned.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Campaign launch can only occur after creative and media buying are complete.

task_list.task_description: Monitor campaign performance, optimize media placements, and adjust creative as needed to maximize results during the first campaign phase.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Optimization is ongoing after campaign launch.

task_list.task_description: Collect and analyze campaign data, prepare performance reports, and present insights and recommendations to MCCVB for the first campaign phase.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Reporting follows campaign execution and optimization.

task_list.task_description: Produce additional creative assets for subsequent campaign flights or optimizations based on phase 1 learnings and feedback.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: New assets may be required for ongoing or optimized campaigns.

task_list.task_description: Negotiate, purchase, and place additional media buys for the next campaign phase, incorporating optimizations and new creative.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media buying for the next phase follows new creative production.

task_list.task_description: Launch the next phase of the campaign with new creative and media placements. Monitor for issues and ensure all assets are live as planned.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Second campaign launch after new creative and media buying.

task_list.task_description: Monitor and optimize media placements and creative during the second campaign phase to maximize results.

project.name: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
project.description: The Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB) seeks a full-service agency to serve as agency of record, providing creative and media buying services to develop the Monterey County brand and promote tourism. The agency will collaborate with the MCCVB Marketing Communications team to plan, develop, and execute integrated marketing programs across Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. The scope includes strategy, creative development, media planning and buying, content planning, reporting and analytics, research, and account support. The primary goals are to drive overnight visitation and reinforce Monterey County as a premier tourism destination. The initial contract term is July 26, 2021 to June 30, 2022, with possible extensions.
project.client_address: 787 Munras Avenue, Suite 110, Monterey, CA 93940, USA

task_list.status_reason: Research is foundational for strategy and creative development.

task_list.status_reason: Account management setup is required for ongoing project coordination.

task_list.status_reason: Strategy must be defined before creative and media planning.

task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Continuous support is required throughout the project lifecycle.

task_list.status_reason: Creative concepts are needed before asset production.

task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media plan is required before media buying and campaign execution.

task_list.task_description: Produce creative assets (copy, design, video, digital, print) for the initial campaign launch. Ensure assets meet MCCVB brand guidelines and channel specifications.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Assets are required for campaign launch; split into phases for manageability.

task_list.task_description: Negotiate, purchase, and place media buys according to the approved media plan for the initial campaign period. Coordinate with media vendors and MCCVB.

task_list.status_reason: Media buying is required for campaign execution; split into phases for manageability.

task_list.task_description: Launch the initial campaign across selected Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. Monitor for issues and ensure all assets are live as planned.

task_list.status_reason: Campaign launch can only occur after creative and media buying are complete.

task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Optimization is ongoing after campaign launch.

task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Reporting follows campaign execution and optimization.

task_list.task_description: Produce additional creative assets for subsequent campaign flights or optimizations based on phase 1 learnings and feedback.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: New assets may be required for ongoing or optimized campaigns.

task_list.task_description: Negotiate, purchase, and place additional media buys for the next campaign phase, incorporating optimizations and new creative.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media buying for the next phase follows new creative production.

task_list.task_description: Launch the next phase of the campaign with new creative and media placements. Monitor for issues and ensure all assets are live as planned.

items.text:
# ROLE
        You are a senior writer and you are responsible for generating output for a project.
        You will be provided with a project description and task list.
    
        # INSTRUCTIONS
        ** Use sow_plugin to generate sow before you generate the following output. **
        1. You will be provided with a project description and a list of tasks.
        2. You need to generate output for each task.
        3. Use markdown format for the output.
        4. The markdown should include the following sections:
        - Project Description
        - Task List Table
        - Task Gantt Diagram
        5. The task list table should have following columns:
        - id
        - name
        - description
        - outline_level
        - dependent_tasks
        - parent_task
        - child_tasks
        - estimated_effort_in_hours
        - status
        - required_skills
        - assigned_to
        6. The task list gantt diagram should be in mermaid format.


    # OUTPUT FORMAT
    ** IMPORTANT: Use markdown format for the whole output.**

items.text:
```markdown
# Project Documentation

## Project Description

**Project Name:** MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services  
**Customer:** Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB)  
**Project Duration:** July 26, 2021 – June 30, 2022 (with possible extensions)  
**Project Type:** IDG - Agency Services  
**Project Overview:**  
The Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB) seeks a full-service agency to serve as agency of record, providing creative and media buying services to develop the Monterey County brand and promote tourism. The agency will collaborate with the MCCVB Marketing Communications team to plan, develop, and execute integrated marketing programs across Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. The scope includes strategy, creative development, media planning and buying, content planning, reporting and analytics, research, and account support. The primary goals are to drive overnight visitation and reinforce Monterey County as a premier tourism destination.

---

## Task List Table

| id  | name                                              | description                                                                                                                                   | outline_level | dependent_tasks   | parent_task | child_tasks      | estimated_effort_in_hours | status       | required_skills                        | assigned_to                     |
|-----|---------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------|-------------------|-------------|------------------|--------------------------|-------------|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------|
| 1   | Project Kickoff and Stakeholder Alignment         | Conduct a project kickoff meeting with MCCVB stakeholders… Distribute meeting minutes.                                                        | 1             |                   |             | 2, 3             | 8.0                      | Not Started | Project Management, Facilitation        | Senior Project Manager           |
| 2   | Brand and Market Research                        | Conduct research to understand… and tourism trends. Gather insights from stakeholders and data.                                               | 2             | 1                 | 1           | 4                | 32.0                     | Not Started | Market Research, Data Analysis          | Market Research Analyst          |
| 3   | Account Management Setup                         | Establish account management processes… define reporting cadence with MCCVB.                                                                  | 2             | 1                 | 1           | 5                | 12.0                     | Not Started | Account Management, Project Coordination| Account Manager                  |
| 4   | Integrated Marketing Strategy Development        | Develop an integrated marketing strategy based on research findings… and KPIs.                                                                | 3             | 2                 | 2           | 6, 7             | 24.0                     | Not Started | Marketing Strategy, Tourism Marketing   | Marketing Strategist             |
| 5   | Ongoing Account Support and Coordination         | Provide ongoing account support… coordinate between MCCVB and agency teams.                                                                   | 3             | 3                 | 3           |                  | 40.0                     | Not Started | Account Management, Project Coordination| Account Manager                  |
| 6   | Creative Concept Development                     | Develop creative concepts and campaign ideas… Present concepts to MCCVB for approval.                                                         | 4             | 4                 | 4           | 8                | 32.0                     | Not Started | Creative Direction, Copywriting, Design | Creative Director                |
| 7   | Media Planning and Budget Allocation             | Develop a detailed media plan, including… and budget allocation.                                                                              | 4             | 4                 | 4           | 9                | 24.0                     | Not Started | Media Planning, Budgeting               | Media Planner                    |
| 8   | Creative Asset Production - Phase 1              | Produce creative assets (copy, design, video, digital, print)…                                                                                | 5             | 6                 | 6           | 10               | 40.0                     | Not Started | Graphic Design, Copywriting, Video Prod | Creative Asset Team               |
| 9   | Media Buying and Placement - Phase 1             | Negotiate, purchase, and place media buys… for the initial campaign period.                                                                   | 5             | 7                 | 7           | 11               | 32.0                     | Not Started | Media Buying, Negotiation               | Media Buyer                      |
| 10  | Campaign Launch - Phase 1                        | Launch the initial campaign across channels… ensure all assets are live as planned.                                                           | 6             | 8, 9              | 8           | 12               | 16.0                     | Not Started | Campaign Management                     | Campaign Manager                 |
| 11  | Ongoing Media Optimization - Phase 1             | Monitor campaign performance, optimize media placements, and adjust creative…                                                                 | 6             | 10                | 9           |                  | 32.0                     | Not Started | Media Optimization, Analytics           | Media Optimization Specialist    |
| 12  | Reporting and Analytics - Phase 1                | Collect and analyze campaign data, prepare performance reports… for the first campaign phase.                                                 | 7             | 10                | 10          | 13               | 16.0                     | Not Started | Analytics, Reporting                    | Analytics & Reporting Specialist |
| 13  | Creative Asset Production - Phase 2              | Produce additional creative assets for subsequent campaign flights or optimizations…                                                          | 8             | 12                | 12          | 14               | 32.0                     | Not Started | Graphic Design, Copywriting, Video Prod | Creative Asset Team              |
| 14  | Media Buying and Placement - Phase 2             | Negotiate, purchase, and place additional media buys…                                                                                         | 9             | 13                | 13          | 15               | 24.0                     | Not Started | Media Buying, Negotiation               | Media Buyer                      |
| 15  | Campaign Launch - Phase 2                        | Launch the next phase of the campaign with new creative and media placements…                                                                 | 10            | 13, 14            | 14          | 16               | 16.0                     | Not Started | Campaign Management                     | Campaign Manager                 |
| 16  | Ongoing Media Optimization - Phase 2             | Monitor and optimize media placements and creative during the second campaign phase…                                                          | 11            | 15                | 15          |                  | 24.0                     | Not Started | Media Optimization, Analytics           | Media Optimization Specialist    |
| 17  | Reporting and Analytics - Phase 2                | Collect and analyze campaign data… present insights and recommendations…                                                                      | 12            | 16                | 15          |                  | 16.0                     | Not Started | Analytics, Reporting                    | Analytics & Reporting Specialist |

---

## Task Gantt Diagram

```mermaid
gantt
    title MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services - Task Schedule

    section Project Start
    Project Kickoff and Stakeholder Alignment         :1, 2021-07-26, 8h

    section Research & Account Setup
    Brand and Market Research                        :2, after 1, 32h
    Account Management Setup                         :3, after 1, 12h

    section Strategy & Ongoing Account Support
    Integrated Marketing Strategy Development        :4, after 2, 24h
    Ongoing Account Support and Coordination         :5, after 3, 40h

    section Creative & Media Planning
    Creative Concept Development                     :6, after 4, 32h
    Media Planning and Budget Allocation             :7, after 4, 24h

    section Asset Production & Media Buying (Phase 1)
    Creative Asset Production - Phase 1              :8, after 6, 40h
    Media Buying and Placement - Phase 1             :9, after 7, 32h

    section Campaign Launch & Optimization (Phase 1)
    Campaign Launch - Phase 1                        :10, after 8, 16h
    Ongoing Media Optimization - Phase 1             :11, after 10, 32h
    Reporting and Analytics - Phase 1                :12, after 10, 16h

    section Asset Production & Buying (Phase 2)
    Creative Asset Production - Phase 2              :13, after 12, 32h
    Media Buying and Placement - Phase 2             :14, after 13, 24h

    section Campaign Launch & Optimization (Phase 2)
    Campaign Launch - Phase 2                        :15, after 13, 16h
    Ongoing Media Optimization - Phase 2             :16, after 15, 24h
    Reporting and Analytics - Phase 2                :17, after 16, 16h

```

---

**Notes:**
- Task dependencies are based on the "dependent_task" and hierarchy from the outline_level/parent_task/child_tasks fields.
- The Gantt chart uses sequential logic for clear visualization; adjust start dates/times and durations as needed based on your actual schedule and project management practices.
```

# Project Documentation

## Project Description

**Project Name:** MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services  
**Customer:** Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB)  
**Project Duration:** July 26, 2021 – June 30, 2022 (with possible extensions)  
**Project Type:** IDG - Agency Services  
**Project Overview:**  
The Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB) seeks a full-service agency to serve as agency of record, providing creative and media buying services to develop the Monterey County brand and promote tourism. The agency will collaborate with the MCCVB Marketing Communications team to plan, develop, and execute integrated marketing programs across Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. The scope includes strategy, creative development, media planning and buying, content planning, reporting and analytics, research, and account support.     "description": "The Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB) seeks a full-service agency to serve as agency of record, providing creative and media buying services to develop the Monterey County brand and promote tourism. The scope includes strategy, creative development, media planning and buying, content planning, reporting and analytics, research, and account support. The primary goals are to drive overnight visitation and reinforce Monterey County as a premier tourism destination. task_list.task_description: Conduct a project kickoff meeting with MCCVB stakeholders to align on objectives, deliverables, timelines, and communication protocols. Document and distribute meeting minutes.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Initial alignment is required to ensure all parties are on the same page before project execution.

task_list.task_description: Conduct research to understand the current Monterey County brand perception, target audiences, competitive landscape, and tourism trends. Gather insights from stakeholders and existing data sources.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Research is foundational for strategy and creative development.

task_list.task_description: Establish account management processes, assign team roles, set up communication channels, and define reporting cadence with MCCVB.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Account management setup is required for ongoing project coordination.

task_list.task_description: Develop an integrated marketing strategy based on research findings, including objectives, key messages, channel mix (Paid, Earned, Owned), and KPIs.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Strategy must be defined before creative and media planning.

task_list.task_description: Provide ongoing account support, manage project documentation, schedule regular status meetings, and coordinate between MCCVB and agency teams.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Continuous support is required throughout the project lifecycle.

task_list.task_description: Develop creative concepts and campaign ideas aligned with the marketing strategy. Present concepts to MCCVB for feedback and approval.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Creative concepts are needed before asset production.

task_list.task_description: Develop a detailed media plan, including channel selection, audience targeting, flighting, and budget allocation across Paid, Earned, and Owned media.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media plan is required before media buying and campaign execution.

task_list.task_description: Produce creative assets (copy, design, video, digital, print) for the initial campaign launch. Ensure assets meet MCCVB brand guidelines and channel specifications.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Assets are required for campaign launch; split into phases for manageability.

task_list.task_description: Negotiate, purchase, and place media buys according to the approved media plan for the initial campaign period. Coordinate with media vendors and MCCVB.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media buying is required for campaign execution; split into phases for manageability.

task_list.task_description: Launch the initial campaign across selected Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. Monitor for issues and ensure all assets are live as planned.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Campaign launch can only occur after creative and media buying are complete.

task_list.task_description: Monitor campaign performance, optimize media placements, and adjust creative as needed to maximize results during the first campaign phase.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Optimization is ongoing after campaign launch.

task_list.task_description: Collect and analyze campaign data, prepare performance reports, and present insights and recommendations to MCCVB for the first campaign phase.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Reporting follows campaign execution and optimization.

task_list.task_description: Produce additional creative assets for subsequent campaign flights or optimizations based on phase 1 learnings and feedback.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: New assets may be required for ongoing or optimized campaigns.

task_list.task_description: Negotiate, purchase, and place additional media buys for the next campaign phase, incorporating optimizations and new creative.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Media buying for the next phase follows new creative production.

task_list.task_description: Launch the next phase of the campaign with new creative and media placements. Monitor for issues and ensure all assets are live as planned.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Second campaign launch after new creative and media buying.

task_list.task_description: Monitor and optimize media placements and creative during the second campaign phase to maximize results.
task_list.project_id: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
task_list.status_reason: Ongoing optimization for the second campaign phase.

task_list.task_description: Collect and analyze campaign data, prepare performance reports, and present insights and recommendations to MCCVB for the second campaign phase.

project.name: MCCVB Creative and Media Buying Agency Services
project.description: The Monterey County Convention & Visitors Bureau (MCCVB) seeks a full-service agency to serve as agency of record, providing creative and media buying services to develop the Monterey County brand and promote tourism. The agency will collaborate with the MCCVB Marketing Communications team to plan, develop, and execute integrated marketing programs across Paid, Earned, and Owned channels. The scope includes strategy, creative development, media planning and buying, content planning, reporting and analytics, research, and account support. The primary goals are to drive overnight visitation and reinforce Monterey County as a premier tourism destination. The initial contract term is July 26, 2021 to June 30, 2022, with possible extensions.
project.client_address: 787 Munras Avenue, Suite 110, Monterey, CA 93940, USA
